snippet: Federal health officials on Friday expanded approval of an innovative Merck drug to treat patients with an advanced form of the most common lung cancer.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration expands approval of Merck drug Keytruda for patients with advanced form of common lung cancer.
lead_paragraph: Federal health officials on Friday expanded approval of an innovative Merck drug to treat patients with an advanced form of the most common lung cancer.

headline.main: U.S. Expands Approval of Merck Lung Cancer Drug
headline.print_headline: U.S. Expands Approval of Merck Lung Cancer Drug
